info.title: Video Computer Analyzer
info.description: Upload a short video (≤60 s) containing desktop or laptop computers. Receive a structured hardware analysis and an evaluation report that covers whether the machines meet your stated needs and estimates upgrade / future-proofing costs.

servers.description: Replace with your deployed server URL

get.description: Returns a simple status indicating the server is running.

post.summary: Analyze a video for computer hardware
post.description: Upload a video file (mp4, mov, avi, mkv – maximum 60 seconds, 100 MB). The server extracts frames, identifies every computer visible in the video, reads or infers hardware specs, and returns a full evaluation report including whether each machine meets the user's stated needs and estimated upgrade costs.

file.description: The video file to analyze (mp4, mov, avi, mkv). Must be 60 seconds or shorter and under 100 MB.

user_needs.description: Describe the intended workload so the report can assess suitability. Example: 'I need to run 4K video editing, multiple virtual machines, and occasional machine-learning training.'

400.description: Bad request – e.g. video exceeds 60 seconds or cannot be read.

413.description: File exceeds the 100 MB size limit.

post.summary: Analyze individual image frames for computer hardware
post.description: Upload one or more JPEG or PNG images (e.g. screenshots or photos of computers). The server identifies every computer visible in the images, reads or infers hardware specs, and returns a full evaluation report. Use this when you already have still images rather than a video.

files.description: One or more image files (JPEG, PNG) to analyze. Each must be under 100 MB.

user_needs.description: Describe the intended workload so the report can assess suitability.

400.description: Bad request – no files provided or files cannot be read.

413.description: One or more files exceed the 100 MB size limit.

frame_count.description: Number of frames that were analyzed.

visible_specs.description: Hardware specs readable from the frames.

report.description: Full plain-text evaluation report with upgrade recommendations and cost estimates.
